meanings.definition: The study of changes in tissues caused by disease.
meanings.sent1: Histopathologies help doctors understand how diseases affect our bodies.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician examined the histopathologies of the tissue samples under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The histopathologies of the tissue looked like a mysterious puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: The histopathologies revealed a hidden world of illness within the body's cells.
meanings.sent5: Studying histopathologies is like reading a medical detective story.

meanings.definition: The examination of tissues for abnormalities.
meanings.sent1: Doctors use histopathologies to check for any unusual signs in the tissues.
meanings.sent2: The histopathologies of the skin sample showed no abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The histopathologies seemed to be playing hide and seek with the doctors.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes scanned the histopathologies like a detective searching for clues.
meanings.sent5: The vivid colors in the histopathologies made the abnormalities stand out clearly.

meanings.definition: The analysis of tissue samples for signs of disease.
meanings.sent1: The histopathologies revealed the presence of disease in the tissue.
meanings.sent2: The pathologist carefully studied the histopathologies for any indications of illness.
meanings.sent3: The histopathologies whispered secrets of disease to the attentive scientist.
meanings.sent4: In the world of histopathologies, diseases leave their unique footprints.
meanings.sent5: The histopathologies glowed with the hidden truth of the tissue's condition.
